products.title: LG A1 55 inch Class 4K Smart OLED TV ThinQ AI® (54.6'' Diag)
products.description: G OLED TV is a joy to behold. Self-lit pixels have evolved to allow even more spectacular picture quality and a whole host of design possibilities, while the latest cutting-edge technologies help deliver unprecedented levels of wonder. This is everything you love about TV — elevated in every way.
keyFeatures: Self-lighting OLED: Perfect Black, Intense Color, Infinite Contrast
α7 Gen4 AI Processor w/ AI Picture & Sound
products.topReview: It’s hard to describe, but OLED just pops.

products.title: LG NanoCell 99 Series 2021 75 inch 8K Smart UHD TV w/ AI ThinQ® (74.5'' Diag)
products.description: Bring your favorite shows to life with bright, vivid NanoCell 8K. Full Array Dimming Pro brings you more brilliant colors, deep blacks and revolutionary backlight control. And with Nano Color Pro, you'll see natural, lifelike picture enhanced by a billion rich colors.
keyFeatures: Real 8K NanoCell Display w/ Full Array Dimming Pro
α9 Gen4 AI Processor 8K w/ AI Picture Pro & Sound Pro
products.topReview: It’s hard to describe, but OLED just pops.

products.title: LG SPK8-S 2.0 Channel Sound Bar Wireless Rear Speaker Kit
products.description: Pair the LG Rear Speaker Kit to an SN10YG, SN9YG, SN8YG, SN7Y, SN7CY, SN6Y, SN5Y, SLM6Y, GX, SL10YG, SL9YG, SL8YG, SL7Y, SL6Y, SL5Y, SL4Y, SKM5Y, SK10Y, SK9Y, SK8Y, SK6Y, SK5Y sound bar for true home theater surround.

products.title: LG CordZero™ A9 Kompressor Stick Vacuum - Iron Grey
products.description: The Kompressor™ lever compresses dirt, dust & pet hair in the bin to more than double* bin capacity.
keyFeatures: 2 Quick Release Batteries and Portable Charging Stand

products.title: LG SIGNATURE 15 cu. ft. Smart wi-fi Enabled InstaView® Wine Cellar Refrigerator
products.description: Three optimal temperature zones provide ideal conditions to preserve and bring out the unique flavors of red, white, and sparkling wines.

products.title: 28 cu ft. Smart InstaView® Door-in-Door® Double Freezer Refrigerator with Craft Ice™
products.description: Stock up and store everything you need. With a cavernous 28 cubic feet of space, this LG French Door refrigerator gives you ample space for all your family's favorite foods and keeps them conveniently organized and within reach.

products.title: 30 cu. ft. Smart wi-fi Enabled InstaView™ Door-in-Door® Refrigerator with Craft Ice™ Maker
products.description: With the Super-Capacity 30 cu. ft. refrigerator, you have even more usable space* allowing you to store more food than ever before.

products.title: Single Unit Front Load LG WashTower™ with Center Control™ 4.5 cu. ft. Washer and 7.4 cu. ft. Electric Dryer
products.description: Forget about sorting or choosing cycles- built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture & load size, then customize wash motions and dry temps & more for advanced fabric care.
keyFeatures: Ultra Large Capacity 4.5 cu.ft. Washer and 7.4 cu.ft. Dryer

products.title: 4.5 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity Smart wi-fi Enabled Front Load Washer with TurboWash™ 360° and Built-In Intelligence
products.description: 5 powerful jets spray clothes from multiple angles for a complete clean in under 30 minutes*.

products.title: 5.0 cu.ft. Smart wi-fi Enabled Top Load Washer with TurboWash3D™ Technology
products.description: LG Top Load HE Washers were Evaluated by Consumer Reports
